name: robotic tee
description:
The Summer Robot is here! This grey and white striped shirt features one of our most popular designs...the Robot. Each piece of the Robot is hand picked, hand cut and machine sewn. The Robot can be ordered on a solid white, solid grey, solid blue or this new striped tee just mention which one you'd like in your checkout notes.

Lap Tee: 100% cotton, short sleeve 
Colors: white, grey, blue or striped
Sizes: 24m/2t, 3/4t, 5/6t

all items are fused and then top stitched by either machine or hand stitch for durability. 

*please machine wash inside out and please do not wash with bleach, this will help to preserve the appliques.*

Please note these tops are made to order, all orders will be shipped with in 5-7 business days after the order has been placed. 

All products and images © Plum.Tree.Studio. All rights reserved

name: Ships Ahoy Tee
description:
This cotton grey long sleeved tee was given our newest creation, a large blue boat with red and white polka dot sails. It's perfect for any little boy who loves boats or pirates! 

Tee: 100% cotton, long sleeve or short sleeve
Colors: grey
Sizes: 24m/2t, 3/4t, 5/6t

all items are fused and then top stitched by either machine or hand stitch for durability. 

*please machine wash inside out and please do not wash with bleach, this will help to preserve the appliques.*

name: Finnigan the Fish
description:
This white short sleeve lap tee was given our newest creation, a fish named Finnigan and his bowl (home). He's perfect for any little girl or boy who has their own fish at home or just loves fish in general! Finnigan can be created on larger sized shirts for an additional $2.00. 

Lap Tee: 100% cotton, short sleeve
Colors: white
Sizes: 6-12m, 12-18m, 18-24m

all items are fused and then top stitched by either machine or hand stitch for durability. 

*please machine wash inside out and please do not wash with bleach, this will help to preserve the appliques.* 

All products and images © Plum.Tree.Studio. All rights reserved

name: Snail Tee
description:
This blue tee features a favorite amongst the little ones..our stripe snail. This applique can be ordered on either long or short sleeved tees.

Colors: blue (shown), pink, green or white
short sleeve

name: Pinkie the Horse Tee
description:
This pink & white cotton 3/4 sleeve tee features a first for plum.tree.studio. The horse's body was made out of solid brown cotton fabric and her mane was created from a fun pink and brown fabric. This tee is perfect for that little girl who wants a horse....;)

100% cotton 3/4 sleeve tee: pink/white
Sizes: 24m/2t, 3t/4t, 5t/6t

Please note these tops are made to order, all orders will be shipped with in 5-7 business days after the order has been placed. 

all items are fused and then top stitched by either machine or hand stitch for durability.
